snippet.title: Coca-Cola is killing Coke Zero for Coke Zero Sugar -- we did a blind taste test to see if we could tell the difference
snippet.content:
If you like your Coke Zero exactly the way it is now, it might be time to start stockpiling it.
announced plans to stop selling Coke Zero in the US in August, replacing it with a beverage with a different recipe, design, and name: Coke Zero Sugar.
We put Business Insider's newsroom to the test to see if they could taste the difference between Coke Zero, Coke Zero Sugar, and Diet Coke.
